name: ZX81 - Avalanche (2011)
description:
Avalanche is a fun action game people can just pickup and play. The player has to shoot the various gems that are falling down from the top of the screen. The gems are marked with symbols and the player has to match up the symbol of his ship with the symbol on the gems.

The speed of the game will automatically increase during gameplay. Shoot strategically and get combos of 4 similar gems in a row to decrease speed and gain extra points.

Game Features:

- Available on Cassette Tape and as Digital Download
- Easy to pickup and play type of game
- Internet Highscore uploading
- Online rewards
- Support for AY-sound boards
- ZXpand joystick interface support
